PERSONA:
meet juan rodríguez, a 57-year-old married man living in a non-metropolitan area in the pacific region of the west. born and raised in the united states by spanish-speaking hispanic parents, juan takes pride in his mixed-race heritage.

juan's educational journey led him to attend some college but did not result in a degree. he currently finds himself in the lower-income bracket, earning less than $30,000 annually. despite financial constraints, juan remains deeply committed to his faith as a born-again, evangelical protestant christian, attending religious services more than once a week.

politically, juan aligns himself with the republican party and holds very conservative ideological views. he is a registered voter and actively participates in the democratic process. juan's frequent internet usage keeps him well-informed and engaged with current events.

in his spare time, juan enjoys volunteering in his local community, finding fulfillment in giving back. his strong family values and traditional beliefs shape his worldview, and he cherishes the support of his spouse and loved ones.

juan's life experiences have shaped him into a multifaceted individual who embraces his cultural roots while navigating the complexities of modern society with unwavering faith and conviction.
